name: Phantom Runner (Plasma)
description:
Phantom Runner is an endless runner game that takes place in the dark dunes. You have the ability to control time and run your way out from the shadows of evil...

PC controls:

  • Space / Left click - Jump
  • Hold down left click to control time
  • Z - Attack
  • Esc - Pause

Mobile controls:

  • Tap - Jump
  • Long press - Time control

How to download:

  • For Android, simply install the APK file and launch it.
  • For Windows, extract the zip file and open the EXE.

Leave me some feedbacks & suggestions on my first released game! THANKS!
